title: Syma x8c
author: Syma x8c
content: Manager- Organize AMA's, events- Zoom in promoting the currency- Recruit new AmbassadorsContent Creators- Creation of Videos / Graphics to put on different social media. Tutorials, educational videos- Write blogs, articles- Meme creationTranslator- Unofficial translations of documents, videos, guides. Any languageSocial Media Engagement / Influencer-Share information about the project on social networks and groups (on the social networks we decide). in personal account-Crypto Influencers who are part of crypto communities in the most diverse social media-Create engagement contentCommunity Partner-(This is for anyone who owns a community, groups, etc.)Promote the Token in our community and we can promote it too or give out rewards.If you are interested, send me a message on TG:@kiro131313

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Syma x8c on July 08, 2022, 09:48:26 AMTranslator- Unofficial translations of documents, videos, guides. Any languageHow much are you offering for this post and what's the payment method or cryptocurrencies you'll pay? It's better if you just publicly post all the details like these for these openings and as well as the name of the project for one to easier do their own research to know the company or the project before applying.

comments.author: kotajikikox

Any languageHow much are you offering for this post and what's the payment method or cryptocurrencies you'll pay? It's better if you just publicly post all the details like these for these openings and as well as the name of the project for one to easier do their own research to know the company or the project before applying.If you are interested mate? best to directly PM him in telegram because I'm afraid if OP will come back here for update because he is not even interested in Bumping this offers meaning this is a luring thread and there will no other updates to come.___________________________________________________For OP? best to post also the offers here so interested party will have their looks or sights for your project .
